title: ripemdhash
author: ripemdhash
content: Do you know any other than OpenAI and BARD , AI which can write a code?I'm asking becouse I have enought blocked information from them.All those AI are restricted with blocking "important" information

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: ripemdhash on July 22, 2023, 04:48:13 PMDo you know any other than OpenAI and BARD , AI which can write a code?I'm asking becouse I have enought blocked information from them.All those AI are restricted with blocking "important" informationÂ  Hmm! you must be asking them something related to illegal activity. Because AI bots do not write or show results of queries that are illegal in there datasets. But there are many ways to still get an answer from GPT if you know it. I had a friend who was telling me a script or i think it was a way to get all the answers from GPT which in start it hesitate to provide. I contacted him, he must be sleeping so when he will reply me back i will try to add it then. So till now, you have to bear me, so after finding on my own, i find this video. I know my reply is not so satisfied for you. But, i can not recommend you any other AI tool for writing codes because i have used only GPT and its best.
